pageDescriptionId: PT Remala Abadi telah berdiri sejak tahun 2004 yang bergerak dibidang perdagangan dan jasa, dan kami telah mendirikan dua anak perusahaan andalan yaitu Tachyon Network Indonesia dan Nethome Indonesia yang merupakan perusahaan dibidang penyedia akses internet, layanan telekomunikasi dan multimedia.
pageDescriptionEn: PT Remala Abadi has been established since 2004, engaged in trade and services. We have established two flagship subsidiaries, Tachyon Network Indonesia and Nethome Indonesia, which are companies in the field of internet access, telecommunications, and multimedia services.
metaImageAlt: The image contains the logo of this website. The letter C with some sort of an elliptical shape at the bottom.
